title.narrative: Technical assistance for implementation of integrated industrial platforms in Senegal/ Programme d#Assistance Technique-Plateformes Industrielles Intégrées

description.narrative: The objective of the program is to assist the Government of Senegal in the implementation of the industrial components of its economic development plan, the Emerging Senegal Plan (PSE 2035) which aims to develop 3 integrated industrial platforms (IIP) in the next 5 years with the aim to accelerate inclusive economic growth to generate new productive capacity and jobs, and hence to create opportunities to significantly reduce poverty in Senegal. The expected outcomes of the IIPs as described in the PSE are (i) job creation (8000 per platform); (ii) acceleration of GDP growth; (iii) increase in exports and (iv) increase in FDI. The Technical Assistance Program was designed: # To identify and fill gaps in the planning and development of IIPs # To promote and adopt an inclusive and sustainable approach to the planning, development and implementation of IIPs # To foster and promote strong involvement of the private sector and to mobilize public and private technical and financial resources through partnerships # To strengthen the capacity of the institutions in charge of the development and management of the IIPs (namely APROSI, HAZES and BOS) The Government has started the construction of the 10 hectares of the first Integrated Industrial Platform at Diamniadio with public funds.
